column4: Can't connect to 64bit WEP network. Am able to connect when I turn off encryption. using a WG311v3 via ndiswrapper, but I believe the problem is that Network Connections GUI menu doesn't offer a 64bit WEP option. Is there a work around or an alternative that I can use?
Don't use WEP, it can be hacked in less than a minute
I'm aware, however this is a friends network, and he has his whole family on it
rtfm already. I have the card up and working, but that doesn't address my need
